description: Returns detailed information about the relationship between two arbitrary users.

parameters.description: The user_id of the subject user.
parameters.name: source_id

parameters.description: The screen_name of the subject user.
parameters.name: source_screen_name

parameters.description: The user_id of the target user.
parameters.name: target_id

parameters.description: The screen_name of the target user.
parameters.name: target_screen_name
